1.question: After breaking his leg in the skiing accident, ........... to cut short his vacation and go back home.
1.full_text:
After breaking his leg in the skiing accident, ........... to cut short his vacation and go back home.

Options:
A) forccd
B) he forccd
C) that forccd
D) he was forccd
1.solution:
ترجمه: صادقانه من نظری ندارم که این تابستان دوست دارم تعطیلات را در کجا بگذرانم.
توضیح: در این سوال مصدر نیاز است چون می خواهیم به یک هدف اشاره کنیم؛ لذا گزینهٔ ۳ درست است.

2.question: I ............ to save the man if I knew how to swim.
2.full_text:
I ............ to save the man if I knew how to swim.

Options:
A) tried
B) will try
C) would try
D) had tried
2.solution:
ترجمه: من در حیرتم (نمی دانم) که بدون کمک مهربانانهٔ شما در این کشور غریب چه کار خواهم کرد.
۱) فرض کردن

3.question: The boss would get mad if you leave early again, so ........... ask for his permission first.
3.full_text:
The boss would get mad if you leave early again, so ........... ask for his permission first.

Options:
A) you should
B) you might
C) would you
D) you are going to
3.solution:
۲) تعجب کردن، در حیرت بودن ۳) ترجیح دادن
ترجمه: او مطلقاً غیرقابل فهم بود هنگامی که به زبانی صحبت می کرد که با آن من اصلاً آشنا نبودم.
۱) مغرور، مفتخر

4.question: ............., I have no idea where I would like to vacation this summer.
4.full_text:
............., I have no idea where I would like to vacation this summer.

Options:
A) I am honest
B) Be honest
C) To be honest
D) Honest I am
4.solution:
۲۲) ماهر
۳) تک زبانه
۴) متنفر بودن
۴) غیرقابل فهم
ترجمه: تحصیلاتی که بالاتر از دبیرستان ارائه می شود، به خصوص در یک دانشگاه یا دانشکده از لحاظ فنی تحصیلات عالیه (دانشگاهی) نامیده
می شود.
۱) بالاتر، عالیه، دانشگاهی

5.question: I .............. what I would be doing now in this strange country without your kind help.
5.full_text:
I .............. what I would be doing now in this strange country without your kind help.

Options:
A) suppose
B) wonder
C) prefer
D) hate
5.solution:
۲) خلّاق
۳) پیشرفته
۴) متوسط، میانی
ترجمه: ما سفر اردویی خود را لغو کردیم چون هواشناسی اعلام کرد که احتمال باران شدید بسیار بالا است.
۱) تنوع

6.question: He was absolutely ............, as he was speaking in a language with which I was anything but familiar.
6.full_text:
He was absolutely ............, as he was speaking in a language with which I was anything but familiar.

Options:
A) proud
B) skillful
C) monolingual
D) incomprehensible
6.solution:
۲) قدرت، توان
۳) آغاز
۴) احتمال
ترجمه: جین (Jane) در یادگیری زبان ها ماهر نبود، بنابراین متعجب شدم وقتی فهمیدم که او واقعاً سه زبان خارجی را بسیار روان صحبت
می کند.
۱) به طور گسترده

7.question: The education offered beyond high school, especially at a college or university, is technically known as .............. education.
7.full_text:
The education offered beyond high school, especially at a college or university, is technically known as .............. education.

Options:
A) higher
B) ereative
C) advanccd
D) intermediate
7.solution:
۲) در واقع، در حقیقت
۳) امیدوارانه
۴) لزوماً
ترجمه: من بیشتر طرفدار آدم هایی هستم که برای سلامتی بیشتر از پول ارزش قائلند، من اعتقاد دارم سلامتی و شادی رابطهٔ مستقیم دارند.
۱) آویزان کردن

8.question: We cancelled our camping trip because the weatherman said the ............. of heavy rain was very high.
8.full_text:
We cancelled our camping trip because the weatherman said the ............. of heavy rain was very high.

Options:
A) variety
B) strength
C) beginning
D) likelihood
8.solution:
ترجمه:
۲) ترک کردن
: A تو چگونه تیم (Tim) را تشخیصِ می دهی؟
: B او گفت که یک لباس قرمز بر تن دارد، مگه نه؟
۱) شناسایی کردن، تشخیص دادن ۲) یاد انداختن

9.question: Janc was not that good at learning languages, so I was surprised to learn she could .............. speak three foreign languages very fluently.
9.full_text:
Janc was not that good at learning languages, so I was surprised to learn she could .............. speak three foreign languages very fluently.

Options:
A) widely
B) actually
C) hopefully
D) necessarily
9.solution:
۳) ارزش قائل شدن
۳) کشف کردن
۴) شناسایی کردن
۴) انتظار داشتن
ترجمه: جولی همیشه می گوید که به مدرسه اهدا خواهد کرد و او هرگز این کار را نمی کند، بنابراین من شک دارم که او امسال هم این کار را
انجام دهد.
۱) به عمل کار براید به سخندانی نیست.
) پای خود را اندازهٔ گلیمت دراز کن.
ا ترجمهٔ :Cloze Test
۲) از تو حرکت، از خدا برکت.
۴) جوجه را آخر پاییز می شمارند.
در بسیاری از شرکت ها، شاید بهترین راه برای انجام دادن پروژه های جدید مشخص، قرار دادن گروهی از افراد در کنار هم و تشکیل تیم
است. داشتن تیمی که به یک پروژه حمله ور می شود مزایای بسیار یا نکات مثبتی ارائه می کند. ابتدا گروهی از افراد، دارای طیف وسیع تری از
دانش، تخصص و مهارت نسبت به اعضایِ گروه واحد دیگر هستند. همچنین به علت تعداد افراد درگیر و منابع بیشتری که موجود است، یک
گروه می تواند در پاسخ به پروژه ای که باید به اتمام برسانند، سریع تر کار کنند و می توانند راه حل های مبتکرانه تری برای مشکلات و مسائل ارائه
کنند.

10.question: I am more on the side of people who ........... health above money; I believe health and happiness have a direet relationship.
10.full_text:
I am more on the side of people who ........... health above money; I believe health and happiness have a direet relationship.

Options:
A) hang
B) leave
C) value

10.solution: توضیح: در این سوال نیاز به دو عمل موازی داریم که با and امکان پذیر است.

11.question:
A: How would you ........... Tim?
B: He said he'd have on a red shirt, didn't he?
11.full_text:
A: How would you ........... Tim?
B: He said he'd have on a red shirt, didn't he?

Options:
A) recognize
B) remind
C) discover
D) expect
11.solution:
توضیح: فعل offer یک فعل متعدی است که در این سوال مفعول آن آمده است؛ لذا سوال معلوم است و چون فاعل جمله Gerund (اسم
مصدر است) فعل باید مفرد باشد.

12.question: Julie always says she'll donate to the school, and she never does, so I doubt she will this year. ..........., after all.

options.2: Cut your coat according to your cloth
options.3: God helps those who help themselves
options.4: Don't count your chickens before they hatch

12.full_text:
Julie always says she'll donate to the school, and she never does, so I doubt she will this year. ..........., after all.

Options:
A) Actions spcak louder than words
B) Cut your coat according to your cloth
C) God helps those who help themselves
D) Don't count your chickens before they hatch
12.solution:
توضیح: طیف گسترده تر wider range ترکیب بسایر معروف است.
۱) مورد

13.question:
Part B: Cloze Test
In many companies, perhaps the best way to do certain new projects is to put a group of people together (*) ............ Having a team of people attack a project (**) ............. several advantages or positive points. First of all, a group of people has a wider (***) ........... of knowlcdgc, expertise, and skills than any single group (****) ............ is likely to have. Also, because of the numbers of people involved and the greater rcsourccs (*****) ............, a group can work more quickly in rcsponsc to the project they are to get done and can present highly creative solutions to problems and issues.
Cloze Test (*)
13.full_text:
Part B: Cloze Test
In many companies, perhaps the best way to do certain new projects is to put a group of people together (*) ............ Having a team of people attack a project (**) ............. several advantages or positive points. First of all, a group of people has a wider (***) ........... of knowlcdgc, expertise, and skills than any single group (****) ............ is likely to have. Also, because of the numbers of people involved and the greater rcsourccs (*****) ............, a group can work more quickly in rcsponsc to the project they are to get done and can present highly creative solutions to problems and issues.
Cloze Test (*)

Options:
A) that a tcam is formed
B) and so forming a team
C) but forms a team
D) and form a team

14.question: Cloze Test (**)
14.full_text:
Part B: Cloze Test
In many companies, perhaps the best way to do certain new projects is to put a group of people together (*) ............ Having a team of people attack a project (**) ............. several advantages or positive points. First of all, a group of people has a wider (***) ........... of knowlcdgc, expertise, and skills than any single group (****) ............ is likely to have. Also, because of the numbers of people involved and the greater rcsourccs (*****) ............, a group can work more quickly in rcsponsc to the project they are to get done and can present highly creative solutions to problems and issues.
Cloze Test (**)

Options:
A) offers
B) to offer
C) which offers
D) is offered by
14.solution:
۲) طیف، گسترده، میزان
۲) ماموریت، عملیات
۳) ابزار
| | ۴) عملکرد |
| ۳) عضو | ۴) مسئولیت |
توضیح: در این سوال بحث ضمایر موصولی است (جمله واره های صفتی) . گزینهٔ ۱ اشتباه است چون موصول ندارد. گزینهٔ ۴ نیز اشتباه است چون
بعد از which نباید they بیاید و بهترین پاسخ، گزینهٔ ۳ می باشد.
ترجمهٔ درک مطلب ۱:
بافت فرهنگی همچنین می تواند در امید به زندگی برای زنان و مردان تاثیرگذار باشد (امید به زندگی طول موردانتظار از زندگی یک فرد است) .
برای مثال، زنان معمولاً کمتر از مردان سیگار می کشند که ثابت شده موجب مشکلات زیادی برای سلامتی می شود و عمر را کوتاه می کند.
عامل دیگری که بر زندگی زنان تاثیر می گذارد، فقدان استرس است. استرس در کوتاه کردن عمر شهرت دارد. تا همین اواخر، زنانی که کار
می کردند در موقعیت های استرسی کمتر و دارای مسئولیت کمتر بودند. در خانه، کارهای خانه زنان را در شکل فیزیکی بهتری نسبت به مردان
نگه می دارد. این شرایط فیزیکی عموماً بهتر کماکان عامل دیگری در طول عمر بیشتر زنان است.
این عوامل فرهنگی نقش مهمی برای زنانی که اکنون در حال پیر شدن هستند، دارند، اما عادات اجتماعی زنان در حال تغییر است. زنان
جوان بیشتر از زنانی که عادت به سیگار کشیدن دارند، سیگار می کشند. زنان بیشتری اکنون مشغول کارند و دارای موقعیت های مسئولیتی
بیشتری هستند. این تغییرات می تواند به این معنا باشد که بافت فرهنگی دیگر به زنان در زندگی کردن به طور سالم تر کمک نخواهد کرد. اگرچه
زنان به دلیل سایر عوامل کماکان عمر بیشتری نسبت به مردان دارند.

15.question: Cloze Test (***)
15.full_text:
Part B: Cloze Test
In many companies, perhaps the best way to do certain new projects is to put a group of people together (*) ............ Having a team of people attack a project (**) ............. several advantages or positive points. First of all, a group of people has a wider (***) ........... of knowlcdgc, expertise, and skills than any single group (****) ............ is likely to have. Also, because of the numbers of people involved and the greater rcsourccs (*****) ............, a group can work more quickly in rcsponsc to the project they are to get done and can present highly creative solutions to problems and issues.
Cloze Test (***)

Options:
A) item
B) range
C) means
D) function
15.solution: ترجمه: موضوع پاراگراف بعد عواملی به جز عوامل فرهنگی در رابطه با طول عمر بیشتر زنان نسبت به مردان است.

16.question: Cloze Test (****)

In many companies, perhaps the best way to do certain new projects is to put a group of people together (*) ............ Having a team of people attack a project (**) ............. several advantages or positive points. First of all, a group of people has a wider (***) ........... of knowlcdgc, expertise, and skills than any single group (****) ............ is likely to have. Also, because of the numbers of people involved and the greater rcsourccs (*****) ............, a group can work more quickly in rcsponsc to the project they are to get done and can present highly creative solutions to problems and issues.

Options:
A) section
B) mission
C) member
D) responsibility
16.solution: ترجمه: از متن فهمیده می شود که نویسنده سیگار کشیدن را یک عادت مرتبط با فرهنگ می داند.

17.question: Cloze Test (*****)
17.full_text:
Part B: Cloze Test
In many companies, perhaps the best way to do certain new projects is to put a group of people together (*) ............ Having a team of people attack a project (**) ............. several advantages or positive points. First of all, a group of people has a wider (***) ........... of knowlcdgc, expertise, and skills than any single group (****) ............ is likely to have. Also, because of the numbers of people involved and the greater rcsourccs (*****) ............, a group can work more quickly in rcsponsc to the project they are to get done and can present highly creative solutions to problems and issues.

Options:
A) are available
B) than they are available
C) that are available
D) which they are available
17.solution: ترجمه: از متن می توان فهمید که مردان می توانند شرایط فیزیکی خود را از طریق خانه داری بهبود بخشند.

18.question:
Reading Comprehension
PASSAGE 1:
The cultural context can also influence life expectancy for men and women. (Life expectancy is the expected length of a person's life.) For example, women generally smoke cigarettes less than men, which has been proven to cause many health problems and to shorten lives.
Another factor that has influenced the lives of women is the lack of stress. Stress is well known to shorten lives. Until recently, women who worked were usually in less responsible, less stressful positions. At home, housework tends to keep women in better physical condition than men. This generally better physical condition is yet another factor in women's longer lives.
These cultural factors have played an important part for the women who are now getting old. But the social habits of women are changing. Young women are smoking more than women used to. More women are working now and holding more responsible positions. These changes may mean that the cultural context will no longer help women live healthier lives. However, women will continue to live longer than men because of certain other factors.
The passage would most probably continuc with a discussion of .......... .

options.1: why women are no longer willing to stay home and do housework
options.2: the reasons behind the change in different countries' culture around the world
options.3: factors other than cultural factors in relation to women's living longer than men
options.4: how a healthy lifestyle is important for both men and women in today's ever-changing world

18.full_text:
Reading Comprehension
PASSAGE 1:
The cultural context can also influence life expectancy for men and women. (Life expectancy is the expected length of a person's life.) For example, women generally smoke cigarettes less than men, which has been proven to cause many health problems and to shorten lives.
Another factor that has influenced the lives of women is the lack of stress. Stress is well known to shorten lives. Until recently, women who worked were usually in less responsible, less stressful positions. At home, housework tends to keep women in better physical condition than men. This generally better physical condition is yet another factor in women's longer lives.
These cultural factors have played an important part for the women who are now getting old. But the social habits of women are changing. Young women are smoking more than women used to. More women are working now and holding more responsible positions. These changes may mean that the cultural context will no longer help women live healthier lives. However, women will continue to live longer than men because of certain other factors.
The passage would most probably continuc with a discussion of .......... .

Options:
A) why women are no longer willing to stay home and do housework
B) the reasons behind the change in different countries' culture around the world
C) factors other than cultural factors in relation to women's living longer than men
D) how a healthy lifestyle is important for both men and women in today's ever-changing world
18.solution:
ترجمه: کدام گزینه درست است؟ تفاوت در میزان امید به زندگی میان زنان و مردان به احتمال بسیار کمتر می شود.
ا ترجمهٔ درک مطلب ۲:
به نظر می رسد که مزایا یا نقاط مثبت خوانندگان کتاب های الکترونیکی یقیناً بیشتر از معایب آن است. آن ها وسایل سبک و متحرکی
هستند که می توانند همه جا حمل شوند. داشتن این وسیله در روز تعطیل به ما اجازه می دهد تا صدها رمان را با خود ببریم بدون اینکه مجبور
شویم برای اضافه بار در هواپیما پول بپردازیم. طبیعت الکترونیکی کتاب های الکترونیکی به ما بیش از یک کپی چاپ شده از یک کتاب ارائه
می کند. به ما اجازه می دهد در تاریکی مطالعه کنیم (در صورت قطع برق در دسترس هستند) . ما می توانیم لغات ناآشنا را در یک فرهنگنامه
درون ساخته با تنها یک کلیک جست وجو کنیم. می توانیم یادداشت برداریم و هرگز فراموش نمی کنیم که کدام صفحه را مطالعه می کردیم.
خوانندگان کتاب الکترونیکی آنِ را به خاطر ما می آورند. اگر بینایی ما کاهش یابد، می توانیم حروف را بزرگ تر کنیم. می توانیم Jane Eyre را
هنگامی که بخواهیم دوباره بخوانیم و این کتاب هرگز بدتر به نظر نمی رسد و حتی اگر سلیقهٔ ما در کتاب متعارف نباشد، هیچ کس نیازی نیست
بداند، چون دیگران چیزی که ما می خوانیم را نمی بینند، نه تنها آن، اغلب کتاب های الکترونیکی ارزان تر از نسخه های چاپی آن است و بسیاری
از کتاب های قدیمی تر می توانند به صورت رایگان دانلود شوند.
بنابراین چرا تنها یک نفر از سه نفر ما کتاب الکترونیک می خواند؟ پاسخ باید این باشد که چیز ویژه ای در رابطه با ظاهر، احساس و حتی
شاید بوی کتاب های چاپی است. کتاب های حقیقی اشیایی هستند که دارای گذشته هستند و حضور فیزیکی آن ها ما را با خاطرات شیرین
احاطه می کند.

19.question: It can be understood from the passage that the author considers cigarette smoking to ........... .

options.1: become more common among women than it is now among men
options.2: have a relationship with the amount of stress in people's lives
options.3: be more harmful to women than to men

19.full_text:
Reading Comprehension
PASSAGE 1:
The cultural context can also influence life expectancy for men and women. (Life expectancy is the expected length of a person's life.) For example, women generally smoke cigarettes less than men, which has been proven to cause many health problems and to shorten lives.
Another factor that has influenced the lives of women is the lack of stress. Stress is well known to shorten lives. Until recently, women who worked were usually in less responsible, less stressful positions. At home, housework tends to keep women in better physical condition than men. This generally better physical condition is yet another factor in women's longer lives.
These cultural factors have played an important part for the women who are now getting old. But the social habits of women are changing. Young women are smoking more than women used to. More women are working now and holding more responsible positions. These changes may mean that the cultural context will no longer help women live healthier lives. However, women will continue to live longer than men because of certain other factors.
It can be understood from the passage that the author considers cigarette smoking to ........... .

Options:
A) become more common among women than it is now among men
B) have a relationship with the amount of stress in people's lives
C) be more harmful to women than to men
D) be a culturc-rclatcd habit
19.solution: ترجمه: به نظر می رسد که نویسنده باور دارد که کتاب های چاپ شده در درسترس هستند و باقی می مانند.

20.question: It can be understood from the passage that men can improve their physical condition by ............ .

options.4: taking better care of their health problems

20.full_text:
Reading Comprehension
PASSAGE 1:
The cultural context can also influence life expectancy for men and women. (Life expectancy is the expected length of a person's life.) For example, women generally smoke cigarettes less than men, which has been proven to cause many health problems and to shorten lives.
Another factor that has influenced the lives of women is the lack of stress. Stress is well known to shorten lives. Until recently, women who worked were usually in less responsible, less stressful positions. At home, housework tends to keep women in better physical condition than men. This generally better physical condition is yet another factor in women's longer lives.
These cultural factors have played an important part for the women who are now getting old. But the social habits of women are changing. Young women are smoking more than women used to. More women are working now and holding more responsible positions. These changes may mean that the cultural context will no longer help women live healthier lives. However, women will continue to live longer than men because of certain other factors.
It can be understood from the passage that men can improve their physical condition by ............ .

Options:
A) doing housework
B) giving their jobs to women
C) working jobs with more responsibility
D) taking better care of their health problems
20.solution: ترجمه: پاراگراف ۲ عمدتاً به مزایای کتاب های الکترونیکی اشاره می کند.

21.question: Which of the following statements is TRUE, according to the passage?

options.1: Women in the past did not smoke because it was considered a socially negative habit.
options.2: The difference in life expectancy between men and women is very likely to become smaller.
options.3: Women's health problems and those of men are similar in terms of both their causes and effects.
options.4: If women realize their health problems are because of their new social roles, they would renew their past habits.

21.full_text:
Reading Comprehension
PASSAGE 1:
The cultural context can also influence life expectancy for men and women. (Life expectancy is the expected length of a person's life.) For example, women generally smoke cigarettes less than men, which has been proven to cause many health problems and to shorten lives.
Another factor that has influenced the lives of women is the lack of stress. Stress is well known to shorten lives. Until recently, women who worked were usually in less responsible, less stressful positions. At home, housework tends to keep women in better physical condition than men. This generally better physical condition is yet another factor in women's longer lives.
These cultural factors have played an important part for the women who are now getting old. But the social habits of women are changing. Young women are smoking more than women used to. More women are working now and holding more responsible positions. These changes may mean that the cultural context will no longer help women live healthier lives. However, women will continue to live longer than men because of certain other factors.
Which of the following statements is TRUE, according to the passage?

Options:
A) Women in the past did not smoke because it was considered a socially negative habit.
B) The difference in life expectancy between men and women is very likely to become smaller.
C) Women's health problems and those of men are similar in terms of both their causes and effects.
D) If women realize their health problems are because of their new social roles, they would renew their past habits.
21.solution: ترجمه: نام Jane Eyre در پاراگراف ۲ به احتمال زیاد عنوان یک کتاب است.

22.question:
PASSAGE 2:
The advantages or positive points of e-readers certainly seem to be more than the disadvantages. They are light and mobile devices that can be taken anywhere. Taking onc gadget on holiday allows us to take hundreds of novels with us without having to pay for extra luggage on the plane.
The clcctronic naturc of c-rcaders gives us so much more than a print copy of a book can do. It lest us read in the dark (handy in case of a power cut). We can look up unfamiliar words in the in-built dictionary with just one click, we can make notes, and we never forget what page we were on: the e-reader remembers that for us. If our eyesight declines, we can make the letters bigger. We can re-read Jane Eyre as often as we like and the book will never look any worse for it. And even if our taste in books is unusual, nobody need know: others can't see what we are reading. Not only that, most e-books are cheaper than their print versions, and many older books can be downloaded for free.
So why have only one in three of us read an e-book? The answer must be that there is something spccial about the look, the feel, and maybe even the smell of printed books. 'Real' books are objects that have a past and their physical presence surrounds us with happy memories.
The author seems to believe that .............. .

options.1: printed books are here to stay
options.2: everyone will soon be using e-books only
options.3: the digital world has totally changed the publishing industry
options.4: e-books are difficult to use because they require the use of some extra digital devices

ترجمه: کلمهٔ "که" در پاراگراف ۲ به صفحه ای که می خوانیم اشاره می کند.

23.solution:
راه حل اول:
نکتهٔ ۱: n (A -B) = n (A)-n (AB) "تعداد اعضایی که فقط به مجموعهٔ A تعلق دارند. "
نکتهٔ ۲: n (AUB) = n (A) + n (B) - n (A0B
نکتهٔ ۳: n (A' ) B' = n (U)-n (AUB) "تعداد اعضایی که به هیچ یک از مجموعه های A و B تعلق ندارند. "
اگر مجموعهٔ A را گروه ورزش و مجموعهٔ B را گروه روزنامه دیواری در نظر بگیریم، با توجه به نکتهٔ ۱ و اطلاعات مسئله داریم:
n (U) = ۳۹ ، n (A)=۱۶ ، n (B) = ۱۲ ، n (A-B)=۹
n (A0B)=۷ כ ۹=۱۶-n (AB) כ : (n (A - B) = n (A)-n (A0B) نکتهٔ ۱
اینک با توجه به نکتهٔ ۲، داریم:
n (AUB) = n (A) + n (B) - n (A0B) = ۱۶+۱۲-۷=۲۱
و در نهایت با توجه به نکتهٔ ۳، خواهیم داشت:
n (A' (B') = n (U)-n (AUB) = ۳۹-۲۱ = ۱۸
راه حل دوم:
نکته: نمودار ونِ روبه رو را همواره به خاطر داشته باشید:
B' ף A'
با توجه به نکته و به کمک اطلاعات مسئله، نمودار ون را تشکیل می دهیم:
گروه روزنامه دیواری: B
گروه ورزش: A
همانگونه که مشاهده می کنید، تعداد اعضایی که عضو هیچ یک از دو گروه ورزش و روزنامه دیواری نیستند، ۱۸ تا است.
